entry.title: ZDI-22-948: Parallels Access Agent Uncontrolled Search Path Element Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
entry.summary: This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Parallels Access Agent. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target host system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

entry.title: ZDI-22-944: Autodesk AutoCAD CATPart File Parsing Use-After-Free Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
entry.summary: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Autodesk AutoCAD. User interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability in that the target must visit a malicious page or open a malicious file.

entry.title: ZDI-22-943: Parallels Desktop Updater Race Condition Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
entry.summary: This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Parallels Desktop. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

entry.title: ZDI-22-942: Parallels Desktop Updater Incorrect Permission Assignment Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
entry.summary: This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Parallels Desktop. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

entry.title: ZDI-22-941: Parallels Desktop Tools Untrusted Pointer Dereference Information Disclosure Vulnerability
entry.summary: This vulnerability allows local attackers to disclose sensitive information on affected installations of Parallels Desktop. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target guest system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

entry.title: ZDI-22-940: Parallels Desktop ACPI Out-Of-Bounds Read Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
entry.summary: This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of Parallels Desktop. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute high-privileged code on the target guest system in order to exploit this vulnerability.

entry.title: ZDI-22-939: Tencent WeChat WXAM Decoder Out-Of-Bounds Read Information Disclosure Vulnerability
entry.summary: This vulnerability allows remote attackers to disclose sensitive information on affected installations of Tencent WeChat. User interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability in that the target must visit a malicious page or open a malicious file.
